name: Announcing "Learning Aurelia" from Packt Publishing
description: I'm very pleased to announce that Packt has published Learning Aurelia [https://www.packtpub.com/web-development/learning-aurelia] by long-time Aurelia community member Manuel Guilbault [http://manuelguilbault.com]. In conjunction with the book release, Manuel put together a short excerpt from the book, which I'm sure the whole community will enjoy. Read on to learn more about Aurelia from Manuel and don't forget to pick up your copy today [https://www.packtpub.com/web-development/learning-aurelia].
